AI Description: Gubbins is a software tool for the analysis of bacterial recombination data. It identifies recombination events in bacterial populations from whole-genome sequence data.
Core Features:
1. Detection of recombination events in bacterial populations
2. Analysis of whole-genome sequence data
3. Identification of genomic regions under recombination
4. Visualization of recombination events
5. Phylogenetic tree construction
General Tags: Bacterial Recombination, Whole-Genome Sequencing, Population Genetics
